OOC: No problems with you being GM on my end, Preston, sounds good to me.

=
BIC: Tucson wasn't about to take any scrap, especially from oversized insec=
ts.  Since they were leaping up at him he accelerates to attempt to plaster=
 them to his windshield, then, come to an abrupt stop to try and thrust the=
m off.  It was the old bug on a windshield theory, which he had yet to atte=
mpt on insects of larger than average size.

"Talon, Legacy, prepare to bac=
k me up with cannon fire!  I'm going to need a little help in doing some mu=
ch needed advanced pest control."

Straight Shot was giddy with the thought=
 of strutting her stuff freely, and attempts to take pop shots at the insec=
t creatures via her plasma tipped arrows, launching them from forearm launc=
hers.

" Yayyyy!  I GET TA PLAY EXTERMINATOR!"

Quickstride also joins in o=
n the shooting party, while attempting to fire off a barage of cannon fire =
from a shoulder mount unit.

" Now this is what I call bug zapp'n!"  

--- =

> > raspy,   "They must =
be brought to the mistress!"
> >

 to land on land on Tuscon's
> > hood even as the others moved quickly arou=
nd the sides, three on the
> > left and two on the right, their armored bod=
ies sliding easily between
> > Tuscon and the tunnel walls on either side.
=
